channel.title: UEFI on Valkheim’s personal website
channel.description: Recent content in UEFI on Valkheim’s personal website

item.title: ECW 2022 - UEFI
item.description: UEFI is a reverse-engineering challenge I designed for the 2022 edition of the European Cyber Week. Here is the source code for this challenge. You’re given a disk.img file and the following qemu command line: 1qemu-system-x86_64 -cpu qemu64 \ 2 -drive if=pflash,format=raw,unit=0,file=OVMF_CODE.fd,readonly=on \ 3 -drive if=pflash,format=raw,unit=1,file=OVMF_VARS.fd \ 4 -drive format=raw,file=disk.img,if=virtio \ 5 -net none \ 6 -nographic \ 7 -serial mon:stdio \ 8 -monitor telnet::45454,server,nowait \ This launches an EFI app asking for a password:
